```{r load HFG data}
library(DSIWastewater)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)

data(HFGWaste_data, package = "DSIWastewater")
data(WasteWater_data, package = "DSIWastewater")
```

```{r}
HFG_DF <- HFGWaste_data%>%
  mutate(Date = as.Date(Date))

WasteWaterPrep <- buildWasteAnalysisDF(WasteWater_data)


LoessSmoothMod()

HFG_DF%>%
  group_by(Site)%>%
  summarise(minDate = min(Date), MaxDate = max(Date))

HFG_DF%>%
  filter(Site=="Madison")%>%
  ggplot()+
  geom_point(aes(x=Date, y = N1))


```
